snippet: Jessica Ahlquist has endured verbal abuse because she objected to the display of a school prayer, which has no place in a public high school.
abstract: Editorial applauds 16-year-old Jessica Ahlquist's lawsuit against her Cranston, RI, high school that objected to a school prayer in school auditorium; commends Federal Judge Ronald Lagueux for properly ruling that the prayer violated the First Amendment; asserts statement of religious belief has no place in a public high school auditorium.
lead_paragraph: Jessica Ahlquist has endured verbal abuse because she objected to the display of a school prayer, which has no place in a public high school.

headline.seo: A Brave Stand in Rhode Island
headline.main: A Brave Stand in Rhode Island
headline.print_headline: A Brave Stand in Rhode Island
